name: Bladebomber
summary: A 2D roguelike dungeon crawler where you fight monsters with blade and bombs
description:
How far can you go in the Dungeon?

Controls:

    UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT - Walk
    Z - Dash
    X - Use blade
    C - Use bomb

This game was made during RIVES game jam in pure C to demonstrate the RIV console C API
